summary: The diff implements the four-page SPA with Gujarati content and placeholder illustrations, but it violates the Gujarati-only UI requirement (English footer text) and introduces unrequested authentication/Internet Identity scaffolding. Asset presence under frontend/public/assets/generated cannot be confirmed from the provided diff summary.

missing_requirements.requirement: Use Gujarati-only content for all visible website text (headings, paragraphs, buttons, labels) and apply a Gujarati font across the entire site.
missing_requirements.reason: Footer includes visible English text and an English brand/link label, violating the Gujarati-only UI requirement.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add the generated illustration/image assets as static files under frontend/public/assets/generated and render them in the relevant sections (hero, about, services icons, contact).
missing_requirements.reason: Pages reference /assets/generated/*.png, but the diff summary does not show the required image files being added under frontend/public/assets/generated (two added files were omitted due to limits), so asset existence cannot be verified from provided evidence.

hallucinated_features.description: Internet Identity / authentication context and actor management hooks (login, identity handling, authenticated actor creation).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest explicitly lists authentication/user accounts as a non-goal, but the diff adds Internet Identity provider and related hooks.

hallucinated_features.description: Backend canister method getEmptyArray unrelated to the website requirements.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest is frontend-focused and does not request new backend API functionality; added backend code is not tied to any stated requirement.
Not requested by the BuildRequest and also introduces English visible text in the UI.
